meanings.definition: Any of a group of red or yellow pigments, including carotene, found in plants and fruits
meanings.sent1: Carotenes give carrots their vibrant color.
meanings.sent2: Many fruits like mangoes and papayas contain carotenes.
meanings.sent3: The salad looked like a rainbow with all the different carotenes in it.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork glowed with the richness of carotenes, like a sunset captured on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The garden was ablaze with the fiery hues of carotenes, a feast for the eyes.

meanings.definition: A substance that the body converts into vitamin A
meanings.sent1: Carotenes are essential for maintaining good eyesight.
meanings.sent2: Eating foods rich in carotenes can help improve overall health.
meanings.sent3: The body happily transforms carotenes into the superhero vitamin A!
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed as if infused with the power of carotenes, radiating health and vitality.
meanings.sent5: In the world of nutrition, carotenes are the unsung heroes that keep us strong and vibrant.
